projects.title: Landing page
description: The landing page, and portfolio. This is the site you are currently at. The
portfolio uses MantineUI, using react and vite with typescript. This portfolio
was made for a school project, but has been made public.

projects.title: Kyle
description: Kyle (KarmaDev's yaml library extension) is an extension which uses Snakeyaml
java library to process and create yaml files. It has comment supports and has
the default implementation for managing yaml files, yaml files based on another
yaml file or generate a yaml file from an existing yaml file.

projects.title: KSon
description: KSon is a lightweight and simple java library to work with json. The library can
read/write json files, and makes the use of objects to interact with the json information
in the code. The json parsing of the library is strict, which means is not error-tolerant
which makes it a very solid choose for parsing json files which are required to be correct.

projects.title: LogMe
description: LogMe is a lightweight java library, which exists as an alternative to Log4j. The library
was made thinking about simplicity. The library outputs everything to console and file by
default, something you must manually configure on Log4j. The library has a default implementation
for general purpose development, and spigot (minecraft server) development as an example of
extra implementations.

projects.title: Versiona
description: Versiona is a java library, which helps on maintaining all the good practices when versioning
your products. Versiona is compatible with X.Y.Z-BUILD and X.Y.Z.A-BUILD version schemas, and it
has a built-in version checker, which makes version-checkers for your products easier, as the logic
for it is completely handled by this library.

projects.title: API server
description: API server is a project which was made as a request, for an user which requested an API server which
serves content under programically generated URLs. The client makes a request to the API server, which
provides then a response with a key, and the route mappings. The route mappings uses codes, to prevent
exposing them to the public. The API server also serves as a way of validating requests for an API service
